body.name: Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, 5G WiFi Native 1080P 10000L 4K Supported, FUDONI Portable Outdoor Projector with Screen for Home Theater, Compatible with HDMI/USB/PC/TV Box/iOS and Android Phone

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: [5G WiFi and 5.1 Bluetooth Function] Thanks to 5G and 2.4G Dual-Band WiFi function, the projector with WiFi and Bluetooth enjoys a faster wireless speed, wider range, and smoother transmission than other 2.4G single-band projectors. Within 5 seconds it gets connected successfully. With the help of 5.1 Bluetooth chip you can connect the projector with the Bluetooth speaker to improve sound at a party or outdoor entertainment as it offers a stable and fast speed.

[Native 1080P Full HD Resolution] This movie projector provides vivid and sharp HD images with 1920x1080 real resolution and 10000:1 contrast ratio. To make it perfect to watch movies, tv, displaying photos and other decorations, the projector contains 3LCD color calibration 10000L tech display. By providing clear images while protecting the eyes, this TV projector adopts high-refraction 6 layers glassed lens and diffuse reflection eye-caring light source.

[Zoom Function and Loud Speakers] For you to enjoy the 30 - 230 inches large screen easily, this Bluetooth projector contains 100%-50% zoom function. Without any external speakers, you can enjoy great stereo with the help of built-in 5W dual stereo speakers with an SRS sound system. While watching videos, you do not have to worry about overusing the 4k projector or falling asleep as it has an auto sleep timer. It is safe and intelligent.

[Multiple Interfaces and Compatibility] The WiFi projector makes your home electronic devices more dynamic and useful and it is compatible with iPhone, Android phone, Laptop, PC, tablet, Xbox, TV Stick, Roku, Chromecast, DVD, Gaming device, USB Drive, external speaker, earphone, etc. as it contains multiple ports like USB, HDMI, VGA, Audio and AV ports.

[Neat Portable Size and Various Uses] This outdoor projector is only 3.63lb, it’s portable and can be carried anywhere like the yard, garden, garage, RVs, camping, etc. A portable power station can power the video projector easily if you are using it outdoors (with a 100 inches screen in the box). It is ideal for online classes, yoga exercises, and assisting tailors and painters in creating artwork.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5G WiFi and 5.1 Bluetooth Function With 5G WiFi latest function, the projector will offer you a faster wireless speed, wider range, and smoother transmission. Say goodbye to the traditional connection hassle. The latest 5.1 Bluetooth function helps you to get the best sound with your own speaker. Native 1080P Resolution, 4K Supported FUDONI projector is with true 1920*1080 Full HD resolution and 10000:1 contrast ratio, make the large LCD projection an abundance of original HD images. It also supports 4K when you project it with an HDMI cable. Daily DIY & Decoration Projection During the birthday party, anniversary celebration, or graduation party, our projector will help you to create the best atmosphere. You can also use the mini projector to project pictures to assist in cookie teaching, party decoration, virtual window projection, painting, sewing and so on. Support Ceiling/Tripod/Table/ Front and Rear The powerful projector supports ceiling and rear projection. For important holiday's (Halloween, Christmas, New Year) decorations, this projector can back project beautiful pictures onto your Windows or screen via rear function. You'll be pleasantly surprised by this meaningful design!

The Projector with 5G WiFi and Buetooth for Home & Outdoor Entertainment Native Resolution: 1920*1080Contrast Ratio: 10000:1Aspect Ratio: 4:3/16:9Projection Size: 30''-230"Zoom Function: 50%-100%Ports: USB, HDMI, AV, VGAAudio Output: 3.5mm Jack CablePower Supply AC IN: 110V-240V 50/60Hz Packing List Native 1080P Projector×1, 100'' Screen×1, HDMI Cable×1, Remote×1, Power Cable×1, 3-in-1 AV Cable×1, User Manual×1

5.1 Latest Bluetooth Offers More Excellent Sound When You need How to Make Bluetooth Works Well To find the Bluetooth option out, please choose “Bluetooth" in the homepage. Then make the projector to recognize the Bluetooth speaker that you want to connect. It is better to keep the Bluetooth speaker away from the projector within 3m to get stable transmission.All projectors' Bluetooth function is mainly used to connect a Bluetooth speaker/headset/earphone to improve the sound when you need it. Not for phone data or video transmission.If the projector's Bluetooth can't recognize your speaker, please try to reset the projector, turn off your speaker then turn it on again.

Restores True Color, More Vivid With 1920*1080 native resolution, high lumens, and excellent NTSC, the home projector creates sharp and vivid images. Pitch an awesome home theater with your family getting off work or at the weekend. Big Screen for Wonderful Decorations With 30''-230'' large screen and 100%-50% Zoom function. The projector with screen is perfect for video watching and photo displaying. You can show anything you want at the birthday party, anniversary celebration or other decorations. TV Stick Projector Protect Eyes The home theater projector is compatible with a TV Stick, TV Box, or Chromecast. Adopts a high-refraction 6 layers glassed lens and diffuse reflection eye-caring light source. You can enjoy Netflix, Hulu, YouTube, etc. in Full HD image quality with no eye damage.

LED Light Source Lens & Long Lamp The LCD projector adopted diffuses reflection with the LED light source. This light source is healthy and has no infrared light and ultraviolet radiation, not blinding dazzling. It can be very good to protect the elderly and children's eyesight. Extend lamp life to 60,000 hours. You can use it for about 50 years if use it for three hours a day. Built-in Dual SRS Hi-Fi Speakers Built-in dual stereo speakers with an SRS sound system, the video projector offers you high quality sound. The powerful speakers give you an immersive experience without connecting speakers at home. *You can connect the projector with an external speaker via Bluetooth or a 3.5mm Jack cable to improve the sound. Advanced Cooling Tech & Lower Noise With the advanced cooling technology and fan noise suppression system, the heat of the bulb can be effectively cooled and the noise is greatly reduced. *It is normal that the fan has a sound when turning on the projector OR playing some bright video because the fan is working hard to cool the projector to protect the lamp.

How to Connect the Projector with Your Devices via WiFi? For iOS Device Go to the "WiFi" or "Setting" in “Screen Mirroring” of the projector to join in your router's WiFi.Then choose "iOS Screen" in “Screen Mirroring” of the projector.Turn on the WLAN of your iOS device and connect to the same WiFi above. Then go to "Screen Mirroring" of your phone and select "RJ-XXXXX" to connect.The WiFi connection success. For Android Device Please check if your Android phone has a Screen Casting function in Settings first.Go to “Screen Mirroring” of the projector then choose "Andriod Screen".Turn on the WLAN of your Android device. Then turn on the "Screen Casting/Mirroring" function in your phone's Settings and select "RJ-XXXXX" to connect. For Windows Laptop Go to the "WiFi" or "Setting" in “Screen Mirroring” of the projector to join in your router's WiFi.Then choose "Android Screen" in “Screen Mirroring” of the projector.Press the "Win+K" key on the computer, then select "RJ-XXXXX" to connect. Please make the projector and your laptop connect to the same WiFi network.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for bedroom
reviews.reviewText: We had a 65in tv go out in a bedroom and didn’t want to pay a ridiculous amount to replace it. Bought this projector and it’s the best choice we’ve made. Easy to set up, clear picture, and the internal speakers are decent, connecting to a Bluetooth speaker was super easy as well. Only downside is having to by a separate streaming device, and that I can’t have one in every room since they aren’t dark enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Projector for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I don't write many reviews but I just realized I've had this one for a year and it's still performing great. I got this as a cheap projector for family movie nights in the backyard and had low expectations. This works perfectly for our needs & we're happy with it. I used to work as a projectionist, both with 35mm film and the latest digital projectors, this is nowhere near what you'd get at a cinema, but it also costs a fraction of what even a cinema projector's light bulb costs (not to mention the electricity needed to run a cinema projector) and for the price and size, this is pretty good. We don't use the screen it came with anymore; it looks great just on a white wall. The speaker is fine, but pretty weak, and it's easy to run a line to a better sound system (note: if it's bluetooth there's going to be a bit of lag).We've watched many movies on this with no issues at all and it's still going strong. I have a fancier name-brand projector we use for presentations at the office and, when that one dies, I'll probably just replace it with one of these. Highly recommended. Also, the reviews that mention it not working in the daylight are accurate. That'll be the case with any projector. Even the ones I've worked with that have a laser light engine and a six-figure price tag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great projector and great support team
reviews.reviewText: Value for money and ease of use great picture quality. The support team is very helpful too. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for church confidence screen
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Small compact unit doesn't take up much space. Very bright and clear for what we need it for in church. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars SAVE UR MONEY
reviews.reviewText: i expected more for that price, the sound is bad and it sound really cheap if that makes sense and the quality is a bit blurry but its whatever. i wouldnt buy if i knew it would be like this also theres this noise it makes its like a fan and its everytime it turns on it’s annoying. gosh i wish i could return but i destroyed the packaging. *EDITIED* its glitchy now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product! Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Amazing value for the price! The projector itself is very small, light weight and even comes with a projector screen that is easy to setup. I didn't use the screen but I did really appreciated it. I actually projected movies against a blank white wall via my laptop and Firestick (as seen in my video). I have not tried to mirror anything yet, but from the reviews I've read it seems like there's no issues or problems with mirroring devices.It supports both wired and wireless connections, and it is also bluetooth compatible. I connected my Bluetooth speaker system to give it that movie theater sound effect and I love it! The sound quality is good and so is the video!It supports HDMI, USB, SD card, and more.Again, picture quality is really good! I bought this projector for my vacation home and I did not want to buy a TV because wanted to save space and money. I am very happy with my purchase and I honestly believe for the value and price combined, you can't beat it! I am very happy with my purchase. If you're looking for an inexpensive project to suit your basic needs, look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My family loves this projector. Easy setup and amazing picture quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Good Projector
reviews.reviewText: Works with IPad, Cell Phone and Wired HDMI. Bluetooth also works when using alternate speaker. You can adjust it and focus it to get a clear picture. The screen included is also perfect. If you want a theatre experience at home get it. I do recommend a nice Bluetooth speaker or alternate sound system as the speakers on the projector are pretty low volume and can’t be adjusted. Once connected to alternate speakers you can adjust the sound via Bluetooth
Qualidade da imagem bem básica. Atende pra quem deseja projeção em salas bem pequenas, que não foi meu caso. Produto devolvido.

reviews.reviewTitle: Una excelete compra, si le añades unas buenas bocinas es la combinación perfecta.
reviews.reviewText: Una excelete compra, si le añades unas buenas bocinas es la combinación perfecta.
Will mirror your device but any video app you have like Netflix Disney and so on won’t play. If this is what your buying it for then save your money and don’t buy this device.
Bueno y barato , fácil modo de uso

reviews.reviewTitle: No proyecta por HDMI. Calidad imágen baja y pobre sonido.
reviews.reviewText: No me permite proyectar usando el HDMI (detecta la señal, pero solo se ve la pantalla en blanco), ya he intentado con diferentes cables y computadoras. La calidad de imagen es aceptable y muy bajo el volumen. No lo pude regresar pues no había probado usando HDMI y se me paso el tiempo de devolución.
